thread.title: Sprint says to expand roaming to Cuba
thread.title_full: Sprint says to expand roaming to Cuba | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: Sprint says to expand roaming to Cuba
text:
SAN FRANCISCO Sprint Corp ( S.N ) said it plans to expand roaming to Cuba but did not offer a set time frame or any additional details.
A company spokeswoman told Reuters the phone carrier would be expanding to Cuba "soon" after the U.S. government eased restrictions on Friday for American companies seeking to do business in Cuba.
(Reporting By Yasmeen Abutaleb; Editing by Chris Reese )
